TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditableDesignerRegion extends System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion

summary.span: 表示关联控件的设计时标记内的可编辑内容区域。

span.span: Represents an editable content region within the design-time markup for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来帮助管理在设计时模板。Use the class to help manage templates at design time. A将使用此类的实例及其方法来生成 HTML 标记的区域的内容。A will use an instance of this class with its method to generate HTML markup of the region's content. ## Examples 此示例演示如何创建两个可单击区域的控件和具有两个视图或模板对象。This example shows how to create a control with two clickable regions and an object with two views, or templates. 编译该项目，然后在可视化设计器中打开页面，并切换到设计 (WYSIWYG) 视图。Compile the project, then open the page in a visual designer and switch to design (WYSIWYG) view. 有两个可单击视图，**视图 1**和**视图 2**。There are two clickable views, **View1** and **View2**. 单击**视图 1**并将其拖从到空的设计器区域的可单击区域的正下方的页的下半部分的控件。Click **View1** and drag the control from the lower part of the page into the empty designer region just below the clickable regions. 单击**视图 2**并将其拖到空的设计器区域的控件。Click **View2** and drag the control into the empty designer region. 单击**视图 1**再次，和区域，其中包含随即再次出现。Click **View1** again, and the region with the reappears. 单击**视图 2**和区域，其中包含随即再次出现。Click **View2** and the region with the reappears. 切换回源视图，以查看所做的更改的 HTML 标记中持久保存的方式Switch back to source view to see how your changes are persisted in the HTML markup > [!NOTE] > 你的项目必须具有 System.Design.dll 程序集的引用。Your project must have a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly. [!code-csharp[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/CS/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/VB/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/CS/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/VB/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.aspx#8)]
